original_text: And when the children of Israel heard of it, the whole congregation of the children of Israel gathered themselves together at Shiloh, to go up to war against them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 이를 듣자 곧 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중이 실로에 모여서 그들과 싸우러 가려 하니라

sentences.original_text: And when the children of Israel heard of it
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손들이 이 소식을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: the whole congregation of the children of Israel
to go up to war against them
